colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (SMRAS PA, RNAM DKAR BYA BA YID BZHIN 'GRUB PA'I LAS, ,MYUR MGYOGS GA-YO BA'I CHA LA RLUNG RTA ZHES, ,BTAGS PA'I MING TZAM SGYU MA'I ROL RTZED GYIS, ,KUN GYI DGA' STON SGRUB PA'I 'DI KO MTSAN, ,RLUNG SEMS 'JUG PA GCIG TSUL NYIN BYED 'OD, ,SNYING GI PADMO'I ZE 'BRUR SIM PA NA, BDAG BLO SPRANG RTZI'I NGO LA CHAGS PA YI, ,MCHOG CHOG BUNG BA'I GLU DBYANGS 'DI LTAR SNYAN, ,DE LAS 'ONG BA'I LEGS BYAS BSAM 'PHEL DBANG, ,BYANG CHUB SMON LAM KUN BZANG SNYIM PA RU, ,'BRAL BA MED PAR BSNAMS PA'I MCHOD SPRIN GYIS, ,RGYAL BA SRAS BCAS RTAG TU DGYIS GYUR CIG , ,,'DI LA RLUNG DANG KLUNG ZHES PA GNYIS YOD PA NI DON 'DRA BA 'AM, ,GANG LTAR YANG SNGA MA'I YI GE LTAR BYA TE, MCHOG GSUM SPYI LA MCHOD PA'I SGO NAS RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I CHO GA 'DI NI CHEN PO HOR YUL GYI GRVA RIGS @010A *, ,BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS DANG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS RLUNG RTA'I BSKANG BSHAGS CIG BGYIS CES DNGOS PO'I SKYES DANG BCAS YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I MOS NGOR, ^ BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS DANG LO NYER BRGYAD LA BABS PA'I NAG ZLA BA'I YAR TSES BZANG PO'I CHOS SDE CHOS PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RANG GSHAG NAS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BSAM 'GRUB MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
